basics.label: Finance and Operations Manager
basics.summary: Results-driven, efficiency-conscious International Business Management Executive with extensive experience including financial management, organizational development, business development and team building within diverse industries.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: A senior business partner participating in the development of the strategic direction, leadership, management and growth of the organization.
highlights: Led the 2016 strategic planning process resulting in a detailed 2016 delivery plan
Developed a timely and accurate financial and operations reporting package
Recommended innovative alternatives to generate revenue and reduce unnecessary costs
Researched and implemented a robust 401K plan for US employees

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: An executive business partner participating in the strategic leadership, management and growth of the company spanning over 14 years.
highlights: Served as key contributing member to Leadership and Executive teams
Led and managed the M&A activity for company
Successfully grew business by 24% year over year
Led and managed annual strategic global planning process
Responsible for creating and defining global company architecture
Implemented a global commercial risk program
Multinational staff recruitment, development and management

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led and managed the full Accounting and Finance function including all aspects of reporting, analysis, budgeting and project accounting and management.
